description: Tyler Berg is surprised when he finds out that Ricky Blue, the mysterious stranger he offered a bed to the night before, is still there. His husband Max Adonis asks Tyler to get rid of him, but Tyler doesn't notice Ricky following him upstairs and watching him undress and get into the shower. The handsome Latin man beckons to Tyler through the glass, feeding Tyler his cock and then eating the tattooed stud's ass until he craves the stranger's dick. Ricky pounds Tyler all over the house till the homeowner cums, then sucks Ricky's balls till he looses his load on Tyler's face.
title: Refuge Part 2
